description:
Horada is maybe the oldest member of the Yellow Scarves. He is not much of a fighter but loves to look down on others.
In front of the leader he is a coward, but he often tries to influence the group with his own ideals ignoring the leaders orders.
(spoilers)
Horada is actually an old member of the Blue Squares and a good friend of the blues old leader. After the gang fights between blue and yellow was over he infiltrated the Yellow Scarves with many of the old blue members.
He was also the one who broke the legs of Mikajima Saki.
name: Horada
